mean_cn: adj.（语言）讲得流利的；（文字）流畅熟练的
mean_en: able to speak, read or write a language, especially a foreign language, easily and well; (of a language, especially a foreign language) expressed easily and well
sentence: The rapper used his fluent English to complete the freestyle.
sentence_trans: 这个说唱歌手用他流利的英文完成了这段即兴说唱。
word_etyma: flu流动 + ent…的 → 流动的 → fluent流利的，流畅的
